node.text:
When you holiday at The Raviz Kovalam Suites, you dream in colors borrowed from the sea. Dramatically perched on a rocky ledge with private sun decks, the décor in all our suites combine local tropical architecture and contemporary swank.

For bookings contact: 0471 – 3051234, 1800-4252-2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com, reservations@theraviz.com
